channel.title: Physician needs to be reworked a little to make it more rewarding to play
channel.description:
As it is now, every time I get Physician in game I feel like I'm being punished.
Most of the Physician players' time in the match is spent healing people that usually are either thankless or suspect you because it is a class that also happens to be an okay scum claim right now. **This isn't how support classes should be in any game.**
I believe its night abilities are solid, but it could possibly use a day ability that assist the player confirm themself with. Perhaps a "steroid/buff" of sorts that kicks in during the night; either automatically healing wounds should that player be attacked or granting them some other kind of buff.

item.title: Physician needs to be reworked a little to make it more rewarding to play
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
The real problem is support classes one of the few pretty ok scum claims for say MM, assasain cult leader.

basically for roles that can be claimed without a near guaranteed contradiction to the living (or attempting to explain how everyone you interacted with is dead which is why no one is backing you)

In categories
NOPE unless you are the converted form of that role —
The Butler (Offensive)
The Drunk (Offensive)
The Hunter (Killer)
The Observer (Investigative)
The Prince (Killer)
The Psychic (Social)

Workable –
The Knight (Killer)
The Paladin (Investigative) The Sheriff (Investigative)
The Physician (Support)

Feasable but luck required
CW (anyone’s visited either of your claimed targets kinda gets ya)
The Princess (Investigative) (that whisp makes it a bit risky)

We can’t shrink the workable list any further… if anything we need to expand it
